mapper.select: SELECT t_company.t_company_no, t_company.t_company_name, t_organization.t_organization_no, t_organization.t_organization_name FROM t_organization JOIN t_employee ON t_organization.t_organization_parent = t_employee.t_company_no JOIN t_company ON t_employee.t_company_no = t_company.t_company_no WHERE t_employee.t_user_no = #{t_user_no};

select * from t_user where t_user_no IN (select t_user_no from t_employee where t_company_no= (select t_company_no from t_company where t_company_name=#{t_company_name} and t_company_no=#{t_company_no}) and
t_employee_state = 0
t_employee_state = 1
t_employee_state = 2
t_employee_state = 3
t_employee_state >= 0
) and t_user_state>=0;

select * from t_user where t_user_no IN (select t_user_no from t_employee where t_organization_no= (select t_organization_no from t_organization where t_organization_name=#{t_organization_name} and t_organization_no=#{t_organization_no}) and
t_employee_state = 0
t_employee_state = 1
t_employee_state = 2
t_employee_state = 3
t_employee_state >= 0
) and t_user_state>=0;
